text: [Music]
hi I'm Matt from Amazon Web Services at
Amazon Web Services we make available
highly scalable storage compute and
database services along with a
collection of application development
tools to help stitch these foundational
building blocks together now you may be
wondering why a company like Amazon most
well known for building out large
e-commerce sites where you can buy DVDs
and books and trampolines and Blu-ray
players and all the rest of it uh is in
the business of providing infrastructure
to startups at its heart Amazon is
actually just a technology company and
we happen to open a bookstore first but
internally we're organized around three
main areas uh retail the
Amazon.com.co.uk.de
de worldwide collection of sites
merchant services which allows customers
to take advantage of some of our
operational skills in running e-commerce
sites uh to sell to customers either on
the e-commerce platform or ship physical
widgets through our fulfillment centers
what we saw very early on was that we
started to expose some of these services
through a programmatic interface and we
saw an incredible amount of our
customers adding a lot of value to their
own customers in tying into some of
these programmatic services then we had
a blinding flash of the obvious we
wondered what would happen if we took
that same programmatic approach and put
those interfaces in front of our data
centers to allow customers to spin up
the compute resources the storage
resources and the database resources
that they needed to be able to build
wonderful sophisticated applications at
any scale we're very lucky to have been
part of uh some very successful startup
c customers such as Airbnb Pinterest and
even Netflix that have built out their
platforms on top of the Amazon Web
Services infrastructure and reached
colossal scales in a way which scales
along with their business growth working
with our friends at Startup Weekend
we're very happy to be able to offer
every entrant uh and every attendee to
the Startup Weekends globally $100 of
AWS service credits that should give you
plenty of runway to be able to build out
prototype and uh deploy your application
over the coming weekend good luck and
we'll see you soon
[Music]
